channel.title: Acer Aspire 7530 Gemstone Laptop - Good gaming PC?
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/3721/showimageefx.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Width: 40.4 cm Height: 4.3 cm Weight: 3.7 kg
Processor:
[ul][li]AMD Turion X2 mobile processor RM-72 2.1 GHz Dual-Core - 1MB L2 Cache[/li][/ul]
RAM:
[ul][li]RAM - 4 GB (2 x 2GB) 4 GB (max) - DDR2 SDRAM 667[/li][/ul]
Hard Drive:
[ul][li]250 GB SATA 5400[/li][/ul]
Operating System:
[ul][li]Microsoft Windows Vista Home Premium 32 Bit[/li][/ul]
Screen:
[ul][li]17" in 1440 x 900 TFT LCD - 16:10 Ratio[/li][/ul]
Optical Drive:
[ul][li]DVD±RW (DL) / DVD-RAM[/li][/ul]
Graphics Card:
[ul][li]NVIDIA GeForce 9100M G - up to 1919MB TurboCache[/li][/ul]
More Info Here, http://www.acerdirect.co.uk/Acer_Aspire_7530_Gemstone_Laptop_LX.ARL0X.055/version.asp?PID=
What do you guys think of this, I'm getting a laptop in a month and was thinking about getting this one.

item.title: Acer Aspire 7530 Gemstone Laptop - Good gaming PC?
item.dc:creator: @nathanator22 nathanator22
item.description:
@nathanator22 wrote:

TOSHIBA Qosmio X305-Q706

newegg.com

TOSHIBA Laptop Qosmio X305-Q706 Intel Core 2 Duo P8400 (2.26 GHz) 4 GB...

Buy TOSHIBA Laptop Qosmio X305-Q706 Intel Core 2 Duo P8400 (2.26 GHz) 4 GB Memory 320 GB HDD NVIDIA SLI Dual GeForce 9800M GTS 17.0" Genuine Windows Vista Home Premium (SP1, 64/32-bit version) with fast shipping and top-rated...

Kind of pricey, but better than that Acer

item.title: Acer Aspire 7530 Gemstone Laptop - Good gaming PC?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

x blitz x:

I was thinking a laptop would be more, useful, that way i can take my games on the move because I can’t really pick my xbox 360 or my PC up and take it with me. If you know what I mean.

Get a thing that converts the power from the cigarette lighter to the 230V or 110v then plug your xbox and tv in…

Edit, nvm. The xbox uses about 5 times the power your car can supply from a cigaratte lighter.

Read full topic
